Literature.Title: Development and evaluation of cationic amphiphilic antimicrobial 2,5-diketopiperazines
Literature.Author: Labrière C, Kondori N, Caous JS, Boomgaren M, Sandholm K, Ekdahl KN, Hansen JH, Svenson J

Literature.Title: Stereochemical Effects on the Antimicrobial Properties of Tetrasubstituted 2,5-Diketopiperazines
Literature.Author: Grant TM, Rennison D, Krause AL, Mros S, Ferguson SA, Cook GM, Cameron AJ, Arabshahi HJ, Brimble MA, Cahill P, Svenson J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=31.2 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Human dermal fibroblasts:LD50=63 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida albicans CCUG 32723(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida glabrata CCUG 35267(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis CCUG 32723(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida krusei CCUG 35869(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida tropicalis CCUG 34274(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=2-4µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=8µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=8µM),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=32-64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii AB5075(MIC=64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16-32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa SVB-B9(MIC=8µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=4µM),Candida utilis(MIC=4µM),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=8µM)
